text: Wolterstorffina (Wolterstorff Toads) is a genus of true toads. They live in Nigeria and Cameroon. ==Species== Binomial Name and Author Common Name Wolterstorffina chirioi Wolterstorffina mirei Mout Okou Wolterstorff Toad Wolterstorffina parvipalmata Cameroon Wolterstorff Toads ==Other websites== * . 2007.
